trevi_fo.notes: Forward Osmosis plant with heat pump. LCOW improves with DC waste heat integration at higher temperatures.

opex.basis: ~12-13% of CapEx (industry standard for water systems)

performance.water_production: varies by climate and DC temperature
performance.notes: Phoenix, Frankfurt, and Bengaluru have different configurations

uravu_awh.notes: Atmospheric Water Harvesting using dehumidification. Requires dry cooler and air-cooled chiller for operation.

assumptions.opex_estimation: Uravu OpEx estimated at 12% of CapEx based on industry standards for water treatment systems
assumptions.lcow_reference: Trevi LCOW values are fully annualized costs including CapEx amortization
assumptions.regional_variation: Uravu costs vary by installation location due to climate conditions
